law.catch_line: The owner of shares of stock that were voted against a consolidation, merger, or transfer of assets ...

text.section: The owner of shares of stock that were voted against a consolidation, merger, or transfer of assets is entitled to receive the fair value of those shares, in cash, if the transaction becomes effective.

A stockholder who desires to receive payment of the fair value for shares under this section, within 30 days after the transaction becomes effective, shall:
Make a written demand on the successor for payment; and
Surrender the stock certificates.
